headline: Buffett Shows Value of Working Past 65. That’s When He Really Got Rich.
summary: The Berkshire Hathaway CEO, who turns 95 at the end of August, has created almost 95% of his current wealth over the past 30 years.

raw.headline: Buffett Shows Value of Working Past 65. That’s When He Really Got Rich.
raw.summary: The Berkshire Hathaway CEO, who turns 95 at the end of August, has created almost 95% of his current wealth over the past 30 years.

headline: Amex platinum refresh lifts costs briefly, BofA analysts still see buy opportunity
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America maintained its Buy rating on American Express (NYSE:AXP) ahead of a planned refresh of its U.S. Platinum Card this fall, saying the move should temporarily lift costs but strengthen customer retention.

raw.headline: Amex platinum refresh lifts costs briefly, BofA analysts still see buy opportunity
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America maintained its Buy rating on American Express (NYSE:AXP) ahead of a planned refresh of its U.S. Platinum Card this fall, saying the move should temporarily lift costs but strengthen customer retention.

headline: Is American Express Winning the Loyalty Battle Against Fintechs?
summary: AXP leverages its rewards program, premium perks and digital upgrades to retain loyalty against fintech rivals.

headline: BitMine Expands Stock Sale Program To $24.5 Billion For Ethereum Purchases
summary: BitMine Immersion Technologies (AMEX:BMNR) has significantly expanded its stock sale capacity, outlining plans to raise up to $24.5 billion to accelerate Ethereum acquisitions. What Happened: According to a supplementary prospectus filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, the Ethereum (CRYPTO: ETH) treasury company increased the maximum total of common stock it may sell under its Controlled Equity Offering Sales Agreement to $24.5 billion. headline: These no-fee travel cards are gunning for Amex Platinum and Chase Sapphire
summary: A $100 travel credit, vacation rentals, excursions, and not a penny in annual fees. The high-stakes battleground for rewards just took an unexpected turn.
